name: I Want An Annventure!
description:
This is a dream from a girl named Ann. Someone has invaded her dream, and she won't wake up till she catches the culprit!

This fan game is a prequel to Annventure by Yoobii. You can find the game here: https://gamejolt.com/games/annventure/191705

Note that assets from Annventure by Yoobii was reused to make the assets for this game. So.. basic color edits.
